# Materials

You download the exercise [here](https://ilias.uni-mannheim.de/goto.php?target=file_1568492_download&client_id=ILIAS) and find the relevant data in the folder Session 07 in ILIAS (see "Dateien").

**Further, you can find free and great resources on data visualization here:**

-   [Fundamentals of Data Visualization](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/)

-   [Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction](https://socviz.co/#preface)

-   [Cedric Scherer Blog](https://www.cedricscherer.com/top/dataviz/)

-   [The R Graph Gallery](https://r-graph-gallery.com/)
